import"./App.css";import{Button}from"./Components/Button";import{Pagination}from"./Components/Pagination";import{useCounter}from"./hooks/useCounter";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){/*

  */var _useCounter=useCounter({initialValue:10,minValue:5,maxValue:15}),count=_useCounter.count,incCount=_useCounter.incCount,decCount=_useCounter.decCount;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Value: ",count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return incCount();},children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return incCount(3);},children:"Increment 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return decCount(2);},children:"Decrement 2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return decCount(4);},children:"Decrement 4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{colorScheme:"yellow",variant:"outline"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{total:10,selected:4})]});}export default App;
